content: I think I'll start by categorizing my relationships like you suggested, and then prioritize the people I really want to be there. It might be tough, but I think it'll help me make some tough decisions. I'm also considering having a smaller, more casual celebration with friends who aren't invited to the wedding, like a post-wedding brunch or something. That way, I can still celebrate with them and catch up without feeling guilty about not inviting them to the wedding. What do you think about that idea?
